title: Celebrating ethnic diversity event to recognise University of Leicester inspirational figures (University of Leicester)
text: ( Source : University of Leicester ) Nominated BME colleagues to receive award on 16 October as part of Celebrating Black History Month event Issued by University of Leicester Press Office on 13 October 2015 Photographs of the award recipients
